instruction: Please provide a brief overview of the potential risks posed by coastal flooding to facilities owned by MSCI ACWI Index constituents.
output: According to MSCI ESG Research, around 7% of facilities owned by MSCI ACWI Index constituents may be under threat from coastal flooding. Moreover, 62% of all the index constituents have at least one facility in a flood-prone area. It is crucial to integrate this information into investment decision-making as rising sea levels will likely worsen these risks.
